definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
"heavenly lake", lake situated on a mountain/used as the name of numerous lakes, such as 長白山天池|长白山天池[Chang2 bai2 shan1 Tian1 chi2]

pond/bathhouse pool/dance floor of a ballroom/(old) stalls (front rows in a theater)
